page.title: 11LIVING IN SANDY
page.content: I HAVE ONLY LIVED IN SANDY SINCE NOVEMBER 1984, BUT I THINK IT IS A GREAT PLACE TO LIVE. SIX O'CLOCK AND IT'S TIME TO GET UP, GET DRESSED AND THEN GO WITH MUM TO DRIVE DAD TO WORK. WHEN WE GET BACK ABOUT HALF PAST SIX CHARLIE THE BREAD MAN COMES. I HELP MUM PACK THE BREAD ON THE SHOP SHELVES. I LIVE ABOVE THE CAFE AND SHOP. WHEN ANNIE ONE OF THE SHOP ASSISTANTS ARRIVES I HELP MUM MAKE THE DELIVERIES TO THE FACTORIES. AS SOON AS WE GET BACK I PACK UP MY LUNCH AND MUM TAKES ME TO SCHOOL. WE START SCHOOL AT NINE O'CLOCK AND FINISH AT 3.30PM. I ENJOY SCHOOL AND PLAYING WITH MY FRIENDS. WHEN I GET HOME I WATCH SOME TELEVISION UNTIL DINNERTIME. ON TUESDAYS I GO TO CUBS WHICH IS GREAT FUN. I HAVE JUST BEEN INVESTED.I LIKE LIVING IN SANDY.
